show_name: Uchi no Ko no Tame naraba, Ore wa Moshikashitara Maou mo Taoseru kamo Shirenai.
other_title: If It's for My Daughter, I'd Even Defeat a Demon Lord
Uchi no Musume no Tame naraba, Ore wa Moshikashitara Maou mo Taoseru kamo Shirenai.
うちの娘の為ならば、俺はもしかしたら魔王も倒せるかもしれない。
ending_theme: "This is Yuusha, but Zannen!? (This is 勇者, but 残念!?)" by Dale (Nobuhiko Okamoto)
